name: Queen
text: On Play: DON!! -1 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck): This Character gains Rush during this turn. Then, give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters -2000 power during this turn. (This card can attack on the turn in which it is played.)

effect.text: This Character gains Rush during this turn. Then, give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters -2000 power during this turn.
